verses.verse: Pursue the love. Be impassioned about the spiritual things, but rather that you may preach.
You see, the person who speaks with a language doesn't speak to people, but to God; for no one hears. He speaks secrets to a spirit.
The person who preaches speaks construction, encouragement, and comfort to people.
The person speaking with a language builds himself, but the person preaching builds an assembly.

I want you all to be speaking with languages, but rather that you may preach. You see, the person preaching is greater than the person speaking with languages, outside of except he thoroughly interprets, so that the assembly might receive construction.
Brothers, if I come to you right now speaking with languages, how will I benefit you if I don't speak to you either in the thing uncovered to me, or in information, or in preaching, or in a teaching?

In the same manner, the soulless things that give off a sound, whether a flute or a harp, if it didn't give a difference to the notes, how will it be known what is played on the flute or what is played on the harp?
You see, if a trumpet also gave an obscure sound, who will prepare for war?
In this way, you also through the language, if you don't give a clear message, how will it be known what is spoken? You see, you will be people speaking into the air.
There are (if it may be obtained) so many kinds of voices in the world, and none are voiceless.
So if I don't realize the ability of the voice, I will be a foreigner to the person speaking, and the person speaking will be a foreigner in me.
In this way you also, since you are people with passion for spirits, look for them toward the construction of the assembly so that you may overflow.
For this very reason, the person speaking with a language must pray that he may thoroughly interpret.
You see, if I pray with a language, my spirit prays, but my way of thinking is fruitless.
So how is it? I will pray to the Spirit, but I also will pray to the way of thinking. I will recite psalms to the Spirit, but I also will recite psalms to the way of thinking.

Or else if you confer prosperity on someone in spirit, how will the person who fills up the place of the uneducated, state the Amen over your thankfulness since, for sure, he doesn't realize what you are saying?
You see, you certainly are nicely thankful, but the different person is not built.
I thank my God, speaking with languages more than all of you.
But in an assembly I want to speak five words through my way of thinking so that I also might echo other words down, than ten thousand words in a language.
Brothers, don't become young children with the things you focus on. But with the badness, act like infants. With the things you focus on, become complete people.

It has been written in the law, (in Isaiah 28:11-12) "'In people of different languages and in different lips, I will speak to this ethnic group, and in this way, they won't listen to Me either,' says the Master."
In such a way, the languages are for an indicator, not to the people who trust, but to the untrusting people. The preaching is not to the untrusting people, but to the people who trust.
So if the whole assembly came together at the same place and everyone is speaking with languages, but uneducated people or untrusting people came in, will they not state that you are crazy?
If everyone is preaching, but a certain untrusting or uneducated person came in, he is reprimanded by everyone, he is investigated by everyone.
And in this way, the hidden things of his heart become shown, and in this way, after getting down on his face, he will bow to God, reporting that God is really in you.

So how is it, brothers? When you come together, each of you has a psalm, has a teaching, has a language, has the thing uncovered to him, has an interpretation. Everything must happen toward construction.
If someone speaks with a language, it must be by two, or at the most three, and one part apiece. And one must thoroughly interpret.
But if there is no interpreter, he must keep quiet in an assembly. He must speak to himself and to God.
Two or three preachers must speak and the others must consider what is wrong.
If it is uncovered to another who is sitting, the first must keep quiet.
You see, you are all able to be preaching one by one so that all may learn and all may be encouraged.
And spirits of preachers are placed under the preachers' control.
You see, God is not a God of conflict, but of peace, as He is in all the assemblies of the sacred people.
Your wives must keep quiet in the assemblies. You see, permission is not given to them to be speaking, but they are to be placed under their husbands, just as the law also says.
If they want to learn anything, they must ask their own husbands in a house. You see, it is shameful for a wife to be speaking in an assembly.
Or did the message of God come out from you? Or did it only make it to you?
If anyone seems to be a preacher or spiritual, he must correctly understand things that I write to you, that they are the Master's demands.
If anyone is unaware, he must be unaware.
In such a way, brothers, be impassioned about the "to be preaching" thing, and don't hinder the "to be speaking with languages" thing.
Everything must happen properly and according to an arrangement.
